title: To all those complaining about the new HUD...
body:
Give it time. 

Jesus f****** Christ.

replies.body: Actually no. How about give us the OPTION to change IF WE LIKE. I thought Riot was about the players.

Go read what everybody that has played with the new HUD in PBE thinks after a few weeks after the changes. THEY ALL LOVE IT.
it hasnt even been 24 hours and your already having a cry, holy shit i hope this is happening on all servers or else OCE will be labeled as having the highest number of babies that cried over something so meaningless. If a hud change causes you to stop being capable of playing this game they dont play the game, you wont bemissed.

Grow a pair.


Oh and btw, it is better then the old HUD, its more effecient and if you give it time you will begin to see for yourself how much better it is

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=s0pFgz0t,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-23T13:18:10.565+0000)
>
> Actually no. How about give us the OPTION to change IF WE LIKE. I thought Riot was about the players.

*"Actually no. I don't want to give it time. How about Riot gives us the option to reject change **immediately**, before we've even had a chance to adapt to it? "*  - *Bookbash 2015*

That way there's no chance of making progress. Ever.

If you have two options of HUD, why not have the choice to choose between those options? It does not take anything away from those people who like the new HUD. 

Changing what I typed does not change my opinion, friend.

> If you have two options of HUD, why not have the choice to choose between those options? It does not take anything away from those people who like the new HUD. 
>

If you allow people that option, they'll never get the chance to grow accustom to change. It's unnecessary coding that hinders progress. I'm sure this is the reason they haven't added the option. I'm also sure it's something they've considered.
I'll be keen to see what the pros think about this HUD in a couple of weeks time ;)
lmao all you crybabies won't even be able to remember what the old HUD looks like in a few months, even if you try hard to remember it.
Lol, future shock because they can't handle change
